hero.title: Company purchase
hero.subtitle: Professional solution for owners who want to sell their company

mainSection.title: Company purchase
paragraphs: Do you own a company that you no longer need and would like to sell?

Then do not hesitate and contact us, we will prepare a tailored offer for the purchase of your company. We offer to buy companies at the best price. Price conditions or company takeover for a fee are individual. We will prepare an analysis for everyone, based on which we will submit an individual offer.

requirements.title: We are interested in companies that:
items: were established but the business plan was not implemented, or the company previously operated but you no longer want to run and manage it
have a clear and trouble-free history and the company's accounting is available
requirements.note: We also cooperate with private executors throughout the Czech Republic, so we are able to carry out debt collection in a shortened time.

documents.title: In case of purchase, we will require these documents:

items.title: Debt-free confirmation
items.description: Confirmation of no debts from the tax office, health insurance company, social security administration and customs office

items.title: Declaration of no debts
items.description: Declaration of no debts from the current owner and managing director (according to the law, they are liable with their property for any discrepancies between the current state of the company and the state specified in the declaration)
